description: Try our easy to follow Onion & Sage Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Onion & Sage Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths

HowToTip.tipText: Try one of these roast chicken recipes or one of our roast turkey recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in a pan. Add onion. Cook for 5 minutes or until softened. Add sage, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in breadcrumbs, butter and egg yolk. Stuff chicken or turkey with stuffing, tie drumsticks together with kitchen string and roast as per your favourite recipe.
